short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add ratings to Netflix and get handpicked recommendations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EASILY SPOT WHAT’S GOOD
Like noise cancelling headphones, but for Netflix. Shade away movies and shows that are not worth your time. 

FIND WHAT TO WATCH WITHOUT LEAVING NETFLIX
You don’t have to open your search engine to find if a movie or show is worth your time. We add a score on every title on Netflix.

GET HANDPICKED RECOMMENDATIONS
Like having the staff picks at a Blockbuster, but in 2022. We highlight films and series our team of experts think you should check out.

SET YOUR SELECTIVENESS LEVEL
We don’t remove movies or shows from your view, so if you want to go for a so-bad-it’s-good watch, it’s right there for you.

Version 1.1 changes: 
-Fix: prevent application freeze when opening a modal
